EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Increases IT Productivity by 40% at Top Professional Services Firm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/professional-services/cisco-professional-services]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
This Professional Services Firm operates a vast Cisco environment to serve clients in the financial services, energy, and healthcare sectors, among others. With Turbonomic the IT organization continuously assures reliable performance to its end-users while having a holistic understanding of their applications and infrastructure.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/professional-services/cisco-professional-services]]> The customer increased IT productivity by more than 40%, improved VM performance and density up to 59%, and reduced user-generated tickets by more than 40%, realizing ROI within 1-3 days.
Did we peak your interest yet? See how over 2,000 organizations <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies]]> simultaneously optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
